mn1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṁ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle.
mn1:2.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn1:2.3_1: bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
